holographic.name: Holographic Will (Vlastnoruční závěť)
holographic.description: Must be entirely written and signed by your own hand
requirements: Must be written entirely in your own handwriting
Must be signed with your own signature
Must be in Czech language or translated

witnessed.name: Witnessed Will (Závěť před svědky)
witnessed.description: Can be typed or written by another person, requires two witnesses
requirements: Must be signed by testator in presence of two witnesses
Witnesses must be present at the same time
Witnesses must be legally capable adults
Witnesses cannot be beneficiaries or their spouses

forcedHeirs.description: Czech law protects certain family members with mandatory inheritance shares

children.description: Minor children get half, adult children get quarter of normal share

spouse.description: Spouse is entitled to quarter of the estate

parents.description: Parents are entitled if there are no children

methods: Creating a new will that explicitly revokes previous ones
Physical destruction of the will with intent to revoke
